technologies.name: Craft CMS
technologies.description: Craft CMS is a content management system for building bespoke websites.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: Debian
technologies.description: Debian is a Linux software which is a free open-source software.

technologies.name: Yii
technologies.description: Yii is an open-source, object-oriented, component-based MVC PHP web application framework.

technologies.name: YouTube
technologies.description: YouTube is a video sharing service where users can create their own profile, upload videos, watch, like and comment on other videos.

technologies.name: Bootstrap
technologies.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

technologies.name: Vimeo
technologies.description: Vimeo is a video hosting, sharing and services platform. Vimeo operation an ad-free basis by providing subscription plans.

technologies.name: toastr
technologies.description: toastr is a Javascript library for non-blocking notifications. The goal is to create a simple core library that can be customized and extended.

technologies.name: Apache HTTP Server
technologies.description: Apache is a free and open-source cross-platform web server software.

technologies.name: Blitz
technologies.description: Blitz provides intelligent static page caching for creating lightning-fast sites with Craft CMS.

technologies.name: Swiper
technologies.description: Swiper is a JavaScript library that creates modern touch sliders with hardware-accelerated transitions.

technologies.name: Plausible
technologies.description: Plausible is an open-source alternative to Google Analytics.

technologies.name: jQuery UI
technologies.description: jQuery UI is a collection of GUI widgets, animated visual effects, and themes implemented with jQuery, Cascading Style Sheets, and HTML.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: Isotope
technologies.description: Isotope.js is a JavaScript library that makes it easy to sort, filter, and add Masonry layouts to items on a webpage.

technologies.name: Google Analytics
technologies.description: Google Analytics is a free web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic.

technologies.name: Google Font API
technologies.description: Google Font API is a web service that supports open-source font files that can be used on your web designs.

technologies.name: OVHcloud
technologies.description: OVHcloud is a global, cloud provider delivering hosted private cloud, public cloud, and dedicated server solutions.

technologies.name: Popper
technologies.description: Popper is a positioning engine, its purpose is to calculate the position of an element to make it possible to position it near a given reference element.
